description:
This proof documents real agricultural labor at MaMeeFarm on
22 December 2025 at 10:57 AM (GMT+7).

The image captures the completion of a morning vegetable planting task, including soil preparation, planting, and watering. The work is performed under strong sunlight, reflecting the physical reality of small-scale farming without mechanization or external support.

Banana leaves placed nearby indicate reused organic material for ground cover and moisture retention. The action shown is not staged or symbolic â€” it is the continuation of daily subsistence farming, carried out regardless of weather intensity or system recognition.

This proof reinforces the DGCP principle that labor itself is data.
The heat, time, posture, and physical effort are inseparable from the record.
No abstraction, no optimization â€” only ground-truth work.

This record is part of the DGCP MaMeeFarm DATA collection on OpenSea.
